name: Dell 16 Plus (Next Gen Inspiron 16 Plus) 2-in-1 AI Laptop (16" FHD+ Touchscreen, Intel Core Ultra 7 256V (> i7-1355U), 16GB DDR5, 1TB SSD) Copilot+ PC, 21-Hr Battery, Wi-Fi 7, Fingerprint, Win 11 Pro
short_description: AI-POWERED 2-IN-1 VERSATILITY - The Dell 16 Plus (next-gen Inspiron 7640) delivers next-generation AI capabilities through its 16-inch 2-in-1 convertible design, featuring Intel Core Ultra processors with on-device Copilot+ for optimal efficiency and high performance. The 360° hinge enable four versatile modes: 'Laptop' mode for everyday computing, 'Yoga' mode for easy sharing, 'Flip' mode for binge-watching, and 'Tablet' mode for intuitive interaction

POWERFUL PERFORMANCE - Powered by an Intel Core Ultra 7 256V Processor with 8-cores for superior efficiency and speed, 16GB of DDR5 RAM for seamless multitasking, and a 1TB PCIe NVMe M.2 SSD for fast storage and reduced load times, ensuring smooth and responsive performance for all your tasks

CRISP DISPLAY & PRIVACY - Features a FHD webcam with privacy shutter for crystal-clear video calls and enhanced security, while the 16" WUXGA (1920 x 1200) LED 300nits ComfortView Plus touchscreen display with Intel ARC graphics delivers crisp visuals, supported by the ability to connect 3 external monitors via HDMI and Thunderbolt 4 ports at 4K (3840x2160) @60Hz

VERSATILE CONNECTIVITY - Features a Backlit Keyboard, Fingerprint Reader, and 21-Hour long battery life for secure, uninterrupted work. Equipped with Thunderbolt 4 (USB4 Type-C), USB 3.2 Gen 2 Type-C, USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type-A, HDMI 2.1 and an Audio combo jack for versatile connectivity. Includes Wi-Fi 7 BE201 and Bluetooth 5.3 for fast, reliable wireless performance

OPERATING SYSTEM - Windows 11 Professional 64-bit, with AI-powered Copilot, offers intelligent assistance for a variety of tasks. Ideal for School Education, Designers, Professionals, Small Business, Programmers, Casual Gaming, Streaming, Online Class, Remote Learning, Zoom Meeting, Video Conference, etc

DISCLOSURE - Brand New Computer has been resealed to upgrade the Memory/SSD. Three-year warranty from Issaquah Highlands Tech on upgraded Memory/SSD. Three-year warranty from manufacturer on remaining components

product_description: This pre-owned or refurbished product has been professionally inspected and tested to work and look like new. How a product becomes part of Amazon Renewed, your destination for pre-owned, refurbished products: A customer buys a new product and returns it or trades it in for a newer or different model. That product is inspected and tested to work and look like new by Amazon-qualified suppliers. Then, the product is sold as an Amazon Renewed product on Amazon. If not satisfied with the purchase, renewed products are eligible for replacement or refund under the Amazon Renewed Guarantee.

name: Lenovo IdeaPad 5i 2-in-1 14" WUXGA Touchscreen Laptop|Intel Core Ultra 5 AI 225U|Intel Graphics|Grey|Backlit| 8GB RAM DDR5 | 512GB SSD | Windows 11 Home | Bundle with USB 3.0 Hub
short_description: 【RAM & Storage】This computer comes with 8GB RAM DDR5 | 512GB SSD

【Intel Core Ultra 5 255U 1.5 GHz Base】It is an upper mid-range CPU with 12 cores from the Meteor Lake U series.The SoC continues to rely on a tile/chiplet design. The smaller compute tile (compared to the H processors) offers 2 performance cores (P cores, Redwood Cove architecture, SMT) and 8 efficiency cores (E cores, Crestmont architecture). The P-cores support hyperthreading (therefore 14 threads together) and clock up to 4.8 GHz. The E-cores clock at a maximum of 3.8 GHz.

【14" WUXGA Touchscreen Display】The 14-inch WUXGA display offers a cinematic viewing experience with narrow bezels and a 16:10 screen ratio, complemented by Dolby Audio-certified speakers for enhanced sound.
【Other features】Intel Graphics,Touchscreen, Webcam, Backlit Keyboard, Memory Card Slot,Windows 11 Home.

【Bundle with USB Hub】Bundled with USB 3.0 Hub, Suitable for USB port computer and other equipment, standard USB3.0 theory 5Gbps high-speed transmission, can actually SUB2.0 multi-port expansion, such as: mouse, keyboard connection.

name: HP OmniBook X Flip 2 in 1 Laptop, 16" 2K IPS Touchscreen, AMD Ryzen AI 5 340(Beat i7-1355U), 16GB LPDDR5X 1TB SSD, AMD Radeon 840M Graphics, Wi-Fi 6E, 5MP IR Privacy Camera, AI Copilot+ PC, Win 11
short_description: 【Versatile 2-in-1 Design with Immersive 16" 2K Display】Transform your workflow with four flexible modes—laptop, tent, reverse, and tablet. The 16" 2K touchscreen IPS display with 16:10 aspect ratio provides stunning visuals perfect for creative projects and presentations as a true Copilot+ PC.

【Superior Performance】Powered by the AMD Ryzen AI 5 340 processor (outperforming i7-1355U, up to 5GHz) and AMD Radeon 840M graphics, this HP OmniBook X Flip 16 laptop delivers exceptional speed for video editing, multitasking, and demanding business applications.

【16GB LPDDR5X High-Speed Memory】Experience smooth multitasking with advanced 16GB LPDDR5X RAM. This laptop for college students and professionals effortlessly handles multiple applications, browser tabs, and creative software simultaneously.

【Massive 1TB SSD Storage for All Your Needs】Store your entire portfolio—documents, projects, media libraries, and learning materials to enjoy fast boot times and instant access to all your files for school and business.
【Enhanced Security】Protect your data with Windows 11 security features and the privacy camera shutter. This business laptop offers peace of mind for professionals handling sensitive information.

【Crystal-Clear Sights and Sounds, Wherever yYou Are】Capture studio-quality images with the 5MP IR camera featuring HDR capabilities. Combined with Wi-Fi 6E and Bluetooth 5.3, enjoy crystal-clear video calls and stable connectivity for online classes and remote work.

【Comprehensive Connectivity with Multiple Ports】Connect all your devices effortlessly with 1x USB-C 4, 1x USB-C 3.1, 2x USB-A 3.1, and HDMI 2.1 ports. The included 3-in-1 hub expands your options right out of the box.

【Rapid 65W Fast Charging & Advanced Cooling System】Stay productive with 65W fast charging that minimizes downtime. The efficient cooling system ensures optimal performance during extended video editing sessions or business meetings.

【Backlit Keyboard for All-Day Productivity】Work comfortably in any lighting condition with the precision backlit keyboard. Perfect for late-night study sessions, early morning work, or dimly lit environments.

【Professional-Grade 2-in-1 for Modern Demands】This HP 16-inch laptop computer combines premium performance with versatile design, making it the ideal choice for creative professionals, business users, and students seeking a reliable traditional laptop computer alternative.
